DOC.brief_title: Vaccination Study Abatacept ( BMS-188667 ) Normal Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Subjects Body Weight 60 100 kg . Males Females must use adequate contraceptive method study 10 week dose study mediciation . Females prgnant breastfeed History autoimmune disorder , immunodeficiency , infection within past 3 month . Active TB require treatment within previous 3 year . Positive breast cancer screen , PPD test . Vaccination tetanus pneumococcal vaccine within 5 year . Vaccination live vaccine within 4 week . History drug alcohol abuse . Any significant allergy .
